item.title: Recommended Websites
item.description: Books The Hudson Review The Literary Saloon London Review of Books Los Angeles Review of Books The New Rambler New York Review of Books General Media Criticism 4Columns - Four columns of arts criticism updated weekly. Each column is roughly 1,000 words. The Baffler - Irreverent criticism of politics and culture. New Models - Aggregator of interesting criticism with some original content. Scaruffi - Encyclopedic and idiosyncratic capsule reviews of music and literature.
